verbose_text: In addition, TRPV1 activation by particulate matter in airway and alveolar epithelial cells was shown to contribute to production of immunomodulatory cytokines and chemokines and promotes apoptosis in vitro [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: TRPV1 activation by particulate matter in airway and alveolar epithelial cells was shown to contribute to production of immunomodulatory cytokines and chemokines and promotes apoptosis
